entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 10 with temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10 with temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
